name: Eerie Spell
description: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. The target must make an INT save. On failure, moves the target makes cost 1 additional PP for the duration.
higherLevels: The additional PP cost becomes 2 at level 10.
optional: If the target is a spellcaster, spells cast by the target require 1 additional spell slot (2 at level 10).
